info.name: Prevent Stealage - Deviantart
info.description: Stops you, ie. the person who installs this theme, from copy-pasting DeviantArt literature and journals. Does NOT stop other people from copy-pasting your stuff. This theme proves how easy it would be for DeviantArt to implement this plagiarism prevention system. Inspired by a suggestion in the DA forums.
info.additionalInfo: Do not complain here if your thing is stolen. This is purely to demonstrate the concept. If your stuff is stolen, take it up with the DA staff here 23/01/14: Fixed code broken by DA update.
